title: $:/plugins/tg/mark-button
author: TonGerner
name: Mark selected text
readme:
<$button class="tc-btn-invisible" style="overflow: hidden;white-space: pre;width: 100%;" message="tm-open-external-window" param="http://www.tongerner.nl/TW5/TW5_index.html">{{$:/core/images/github}} <$text text="http://www.tongerner.nl/TW5/TW5_index.html"/> \define icn(icon) \end A button (<>) for the Editor toolbar that applies coloring / highlighting to the selected text
Assigned shortcut: {{$:/config/shortcuts/mark}} To decrease the added CSS (defined in `$:/language/Marklets/`), classes have been defined in $:/plugins/tg/mark-button/styles: |Class |CSS ||h |`tgc` |`@@background-color:Cyan;`|@@.tgc text@@| |`tglc` |`@@background-color:LightCyan;`|@@.tglc text@@| |`tgy` |`@@background-color:Yellow;`|@@.tgy text@@| |`tgb` |`@@color:Blue;`|@@.tgb text@@| |`tgr` |`@@color:Red;`|@@.tgr text@@| |`tgwr` |`@@color:White;background-color:Red;`|@@.tgwr text@@| You can add new entries via 'Add your own' in the dropdown menu.
